title: Implement Update() for engine message handling
description:
Handle custom engine messages in Update():

case tickMsg:
- Increment animFrame for pulsing animations
- Return tickCmd() to schedule next tick

case IterationStartMsg:
- Update iteration, taskID, taskTitle
- Mark task as current in task list
- Clear output buffer for new iteration

case IterationEndMsg:
- Update cost, tokens
- Increment iteration count

case OutputMsg:
- Append string(msg) to m.output
- Update viewport content: m.viewport.SetContent(m.output)
- Auto-scroll: m.viewport.GotoBottom()

case SignalMsg:
- Store signal and reason for display
- May trigger completion overlay

case ErrorMsg:
- Append error to output
- May set error state

case RunCompleteMsg:
- Set showComplete = true
- Store completeReason, completeSignal
- Set running = false

case TasksUpdateMsg:
- Replace m.tasks with msg.Tasks
- Clamp selectedTask if out of bounds
- Mark current task based on taskID
